Class Simulator

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

The Simulator class gathers and verifies all input data to the simulation and controls the running of the simulation.

Version:
1.00 May 21, 2003
